alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay and south central Duval Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, or over Orange Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Mandarin, Nas Jax, Ortega, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Jacksonville Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
